## Summary
- What changed?
- Why was this change needed?

## Production Impact
- [ ] Backward compatible
- [ ] Requires environment variable changes
- [ ] Requires database migration or data backfill
- [ ] Requires deployment runbook update

## Quality Gates
- [ ] Unit/integration tests added or updated
- [ ] Local tests passing
- [ ] Security and secret handling reviewed
- [ ] Observability impact reviewed (logs/metrics/alerts)

## Reviewer Checklist
- [ ] Business logic remains modular and maintainable
- [ ] Access control and role checks are correct
- [ ] Error handling is explicit and safe
- [ ] Documentation updated where required
